trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Little Elm
There were no other sightings in Little Elm on or around August 4th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailswhile videotaping small rc plane, the camera captured the attached objects on about one and one half frames. objects cannot be seen with human eye. attached are two examples of many unusual objects captured on several videos. unfortunately, most of the videos were taken in standard definition at 30 fps and 640x480 pixels. the larger object is in hd. one more note: while flying airplane at low speed approximately 60 feet high, i noticed something about the size and shape of a hummingbird, color light gray, was hovering around the plane. considering the timid nature of hummingbirds, it is doubtful that it could have been one. if this is of interest to you, arrangements can be made to provide you with the full videos so that you can analyze them. with regards, [witness name deleted\cms\tg]
